opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Stovall, Appellant.
Submitted September 30, 1974.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Mandbrino, JJ.
Harry E. Knafele, Assistant Public Defender, for appellant.
Charles M. Marshall, Assistant District Attorney, and Joseph 8. Walko, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
November 20, 1974:
